transcript.title: Departmental Secretary change
transcript.content:
Ms Lisa Paul AO PSM has advised me that she wishes to leave her position as Secretary of the Department of Education and Training in February next year to pursue a career beyond the public service.

Ms Paul has been a Departmental Secretary since 2004 and has had an extensive and distinguished public service career.  She has made a substantial contribution to the development of education and employment policy in Australia. 

I thank Ms Paul for her leadership and commitment to the Australian Public Service and wish her all the very best for the future.
